mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cofran, Leroy to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cofran, Leroy
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 4 1861. By Telegraph from Grafton " " 1861. The Three 3 ladies claim that you paid their fares to Grafton but only two 2 had their tickets the other one said you took her ticket with her permit. Conductor charges her fare. If you paid it I wish to refund Please answer L.R. Cofran
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Cofran, Leroy
Grafton, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
